option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the outputs of this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all checks.

option.name: description
option.value: Checks to see if there are any added, modified, removed, or un-versioned files.

option.name: description
option.value: Checks to see if your project has any SNAPSHOT dependencies.

option.name: description
option.value: Checks to see if there are any incoming or outgoing changes that haven't been applied locally.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles classes 'main'.

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes the build directory.

option.name: description
option.value: Commits the version update to your SCM

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles source set 'main:java'.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles source set 'test:java'.

option.name: description
option.value: Prompts user for this release version. Allows for alpha or pre releases.

option.name: description
option.value: Creates a tag in SCM for the current (un-snapshotted) version.

option.name: description
option.value: Initializes the SCM plugin (based on hidden directories in your project's directory)

option.name: description
option.value: Installs the 'archives' artifacts into the local Maven repository.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles a jar archive containing the main classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Generates Javadoc API documentation for the main source code.

option.name: description
option.value: Commits any changes made by the Release plugin - eg. If the unSnapshotVersion tas was executed

option.name: description
option.value: Processes source set 'main:resources'.

option.name: description
option.value: Processes source set 'test:resources'.

option.name: description
option.value: Verify project, release, and update version to next.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs the unit tests.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles classes 'test'.

option.name: description
option.value: Removes "-SNAPSHOT" from your project's current version.

option.name: description
option.value: Prompts user for the next version. Does it's best to supply a smart default.

option.name: description
option.value: Uploads all artifacts belonging to configuration ':PharmaASABSchemas:archives'
